examples: he gave a howl of pain

definitions.text: the long plaintive cry of a hound or a wolf
a loud sustained noise resembling the cry of a hound
examples: the howl of the wind made him restless
The coyotes were howling in the desert

definitions.text: make a loud noise, as of wind, water, or vehicles
examples: The wind was howling in the trees
The water roared down the chute
